name: 64 Rhythm!
description:
>>>>>!! KILL YOURSELF AFTER SPAWNING INTO THE FIRST LEVEL !!<<<<<
There is a bug on the web version where the sound will not play at first. killing yourself will remedy this.



Controls:
Switch color : SPACE (you take damage from bullets who are not the same color as you!)

To move :  Your character follow your mouse!

To pause the game : ECHAP

Features:
Vibrant 2D bullet-hell game in only 64x64 pixels!

Energetic, perky soundtrack with original musics and cool sound design!

Tips and Tricks:
Don't forgot to switch between colors to dodge some bullets and try to find the rhythm to play around it ;) 

We hope you enjoy our game!

Credits:

DirtyApples: Lead developer

Prox: music composer and sound designer

Lifesteal: Art Director and pixel-artist

others : ??? Where are they? The game is still in develoment ^^

If interested to help up on this project contact Lifesteal#1110 on discord!
